name: Serve The Walking Sleepers
description:
Bored and tired students invade your café as a last resort during the lectures. It is your duty to keep the coffee machines running so that they can join their lectures again as soon as possible. Repair broken machines by solving small puzzles. You loose if the café reaches its capacity. How long can you stand against the walking sleepers' invasion?

Simply click on the objects to intercat with the coffee machines and the puzzle.

This is for the Trijam #120.

We are a team of 4 people, 2 programmers and 2 designers.

The designers spent 3 hours each for the design and the arts.

The programmers spent 5 hours programming + overtime for balancing the game, so it's fun to play. This was our first game jam and we underestimated the time we will need to achieve our goals.

Credits:

The NewsTicker in the bottom of the screen was made by luca-g97 two weeks ago - so we just drag and dropped it in the game.
